ActMarine and Aviation War Risks Act [R.S.C. 1970, c. W-3]
PrecisApproval to enter into a SUPPLEMENTARY AGREEMENT with THE CANADIAN SHIPOWNERS MUTUAL ASSURANCE ASSOCIATION that will amend the Agreement signed on February 20, 1988, to the extent of making a change in the name and address of the person to whom final termination notice should be given (i.e., Risk Management Consultants of Canada Limited, Toronto), if required.
